pmlib_cpuidle_a8host.c File Reference

This file declares the interface for MPU CPU Idle functionality. This is a low latency power saving mode which allows fast wakeup depending on the power mode set. More...

 Prepare the PRCM registers for the input CPU Idle mode. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file declares the interface for MPU CPU Idle functionality. This is a low latency power saving mode which allows fast wakeup depending on the power mode set.
